Power_Control.label: Power Control
Power_Control.description: This Object is used to control a power source, such as a Smart Plug.  It allows a power relay to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100.

On_Off.label: On/Off
On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Dimmer.label: Dimmer
Dimmer.description: This resource represents a power dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

On_time.label: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the power relay has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Cumulative_active_power.label: Cumulative active power
Cumulative_active_power.description: The total power in Wh that has been used by the load.

Power_factor.label: Power factor
Power_factor.description: The power factor of the load.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
